name: Ext_R4B_PlanDefinition_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.PlanDefinition.subject[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.subject[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Type of individual the plan definition is focused on
element.definition: A code, group definition, or canonical reference that describes  or identifies the intended subject of the plan definition. Canonical references are allowed to support the definition of protocols for drug and substance quality specifications, and is allowed to reference a MedicinalProductDefinition, SubstanceDefinition, AdministrableProductDefinition, ManufacturedItemDefinition, or PackagedProductDefinition resource.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.subject[x]` maps to R4 `PlanDefinition.subject[x]`. Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdministrableProductDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ManufacturedItemDefinition)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PackagedProductDefinition)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The possible types of subjects for a plan definition (E.g. Patient, Practitioner, Organization, Location, etc.).
